Package com.marginallyclever.makelangelo

Class Makelangelo

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.TransferHandler
com.marginallyclever.makelangelo.Makelangelo
All Implemented Interfaces:
MakelangeloRobotListener, MakelangeloRobotSettingsListener, WindowListener, Serializable, EventListener
public final class Makelangelo
extends TransferHandler
implements WindowListener, MakelangeloRobotListener, MakelangeloRobotSettingsListener
The root window of the GUI
Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Dan Royer

  • Field Details

    • VERSION

      public String VERSION
      Defined in src/resources/makelangelo.properties and uses Maven's resource filtering to update the VERSION based upon VERSION defined in POM.xml. In this way we only define the VERSION once and prevent violating DRY.

    • openFileOnDemandWithLoader

      public boolean openFileOnDemandWithLoader​(String filename, LoadAndSaveFileType loader)
      Open a file with a given LoadAndSaveFileType plugin. The loader might spawn a new thread and return before the load is actually finished.
      Parameters:
      filename - absolute path of the file to load
      loader - the plugin to use
      Returns:
      true if load is successful.

    • openFileOnDemand

      public boolean openFileOnDemand​(String filename)
      User has asked that a file be opened.
      Parameters:
      filename - the file to be opened.
      Returns:
      true if file was loaded successfully. false if it failed.
